# External Documentation

This directory contains customer-facing documentation for the Lattice AWS CDK project.

## Contents

### Getting Started
- Coming soon: Quick start guides, installation instructions, and first-time user tutorials

### API Reference
- Coming soon: Complete API documentation, intent schemas, and configuration options

### Examples & Tutorials
- Coming soon: Real-world examples, step-by-step tutorials, and best practices

### Use Case Guides
- Coming soon: Specific guides for different customer scenarios (startups, scaling, enterprise)

## Purpose

This external documentation serves to:
1. Help customers get started quickly with Lattice
2. Provide comprehensive reference materials
3. Showcase real-world use cases and examples
4. Support customer success and adoption
5. Reduce support burden through self-service resources

## Maintenance

External documentation should be:
- Kept up-to-date with product changes
- Written for technical but non-DevOps audiences
- Focused on practical, actionable guidance
- Regularly reviewed for accuracy and clarity
